segments.text: Hello , may I speak to Mr . Richard ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is Michael Richard speaking . Who is calling ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Richard , this is Henry . I was interviewed by you last Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You gave me a deep impression then . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m just calling to follow up on the situation of the salesman position .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have made the decision to hire you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful . Thank you very much . I have been dreaming to work with your company and I am finally granted the great opportunity . I won ’ t let you down and I hope you will contact me when you have any questions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will , thank you for calling .
segments.speaker: S1
